channel.title: PLEASE Help - Will Pay
channel.description:
TO WHOEVER CAN HELP ME - I WILL PAY THEM $10 USD THROUGH PayPal, - DO NOT ASK FOR IT UPFRONT.
Okay, I' m trying to get my server running, I downloaded Slipknot v3 source, and I'm sure i got all the other stuff done, no-ip is done, but I think I messed up with my Port Forwarding, if you can help me with Port Forwarding I'll give you that $10. - I have a Thomson - speedtouch 516i

item.title: PLEASE Help - Will Pay
item.dc:creator: @Magebankreturns Magebankreturns
item.description:
@Magebankreturns wrote:

Dude,don’t port foward for slipknot scape.All you need is you ip then ur set to go.Heres the steps to MY server:

  1. Download the server at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257216.0.html

  2. Using WinRaR or WinZip,Extracct the files to your DESKTOP!

3)If you have virus scanner, SCAN THE FILES B4 OPENING.

4)If it has a virus download a diff one and delete that one from ur comp A.S.A.P.

5)If no virus,open the folder and scroll down till u see “Run Magebankreturns”

6)Click on that and then go to http://no-ip.org OR http://no-ip.com .

7)Sign up.

  1. If you already did,login with ur password and ur E-Mail adress.

9)Were you typed in ur password you she see an ip existing of 4 numbers (serperated by dots.)

10)Copy that down on paper and then type in Moparscape Server Status on google.

11)Scroll all the way down and click Register your server.

12)Fill in the information and some detail that shows what ur server is.

13)Go to http://client.silabsoft.org and wait for it to laod.

14)Enter in your dezired Username And Password and the ip you have written down.

15)Login and enjoy!!

NOTE::There will be peaple trying to crash your server called SYIPKPKER programs.If they log in, SHUT DOWN UR SERVER IMMEDEATELY,or else you will suffer a huge lagg which can ALMOST crash your computer.If you would like one of these programs click on the link here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,265101.0.html

I hope this helped.

-Magebankreturns

Read full topic
